ModulePrefs.title: 2011 Turkish Election Results from Google on localhost
ModulePrefs.description: View live election results for the 2011 Turkish General Election.
ModulePrefs.author: Google, Inc.

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://maps.google.com/maps/api/js?sensor=false"> </script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.6.1/jquery.min.js"> </script>
<script type="text/javascript"> GoogleElectionMapOptions = { codeUrl: 'localhost/election-results/hg/turkey2011/gadget/', _: null }; </script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/election-results/hg/turkey2011/gadget/polygonzo.js"> </script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://localhost/election-results/hg/turkey2011/gadget/turkey-results-map.js"> </script>
